snippet: Dish Network offers to buy Sprint Nextel for $25.5 billion. | A few hedge fund titans posted big returns last year, earning giant paydays. | A winner may be emerging in the contest for Life Technologies. | At 41 publicly traded companies, directors...
abstract: Dish Network offers to buy Sprint Nextel for $25.5 billion. | A few hedge fund titans posted big returns last year, earning giant paydays. | A winner may be emerging in the contest for Life Technologies. | At 41 publicly traded companies, directors remained in place despite losing shareholder elections last year.
